com.foxhole.tools.spartan.states
Class AbstractGameState

java.lang.Object
  com.foxhole.tools.spartan.states.AbstractGameState
All Implemented Interfaces:
INonRenderableSpartanObject, ISpartanObject, IGameStateObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
CollisionGameState, PositionalGameState, PropertiesGameState
public abstract class AbstractGameState
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGameStateObject

The abstract implementation of the basic Game State Object. All the Spartan Game State Objects derive from this object.

Author:
Tiago "Spiegel" Costa

initialize

public static IGameStateObject initialize(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> stateDetails)
                                   throws SpartanException
To use the Level Loader interface, all the Game States should implement the initialization of the class via a map of parameter values.

Parameters:
stateDetails - The values that will be used to fill the data of the class
Returns:
a new gamestate instance properly initialized
Throws:
SpartanException - When an error occurs
